    • Method Detail

      • write

        public long write(Object object)
        Write an object to this stream, returning the physical address it was written at. Note: While the completion of this operation guarantees that the write has been persisted, it DOES NOT guarantee that the object has been written to the stream. For example, another client may have deleted the stream.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to write to the stream.
        Returns:
        The address this

      • acquireAndWrite

        public long acquireAndWrite(Object object,
                            Consumer<Long> acquisitionCallback,
                            Consumer<Long> deacquisitionCallback)
        Write an object to this stream, returning the physical address it was written at. Note: While the completion of this operation guarantees that the write has been persisted, it DOES NOT guarantee that the object has been written to the stream. For example, another client may have deleted the stream.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to write to the stream.
        acquisitionCallback - A function which will be called after the successful acquisition of a token, but before the data is written.
        deacquisitionCallback - A function which will be called after an overwrite error is encountered on a previously acquired token.
        Returns:
        The address this object was written at.

      • read

        public AbstractReplicationView.ReadResult read()
        Read the next item from the stream. This method is synchronized to protect against multiple readers.
        Returns:
        The next item from the stream.

      • readTo

        public AbstractReplicationView.ReadResult[] readTo(long pos)

      • close

        public void close()
           throws Exception
        Closes this resource, relinquishing any underlying resources. This method is invoked automatically on object managed by the try-with-resources statement.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        Exception - if this resource cannot be closed
